name: Making Friends is Easy When You Shoot At Them
name_original: Making Friends is Easy When You Shoot At Them
description:
This is a game simply about Shooting things. It has an Asteroids-like move style (you can go backwards!), and very simplistic visuals.

Keep in mind, this is a very early version so don't expect a very high framerate, bug-free experience, or heavy amounts of content.
